sentences: Awards include International Film Music Critics Association "Best Original Score for a Comedy Film 2015" for the Horror/Comedy Krampus, "Compositor Revalacion" for Monster House at the 3rd International Film Music Conference in Ubeda, Spain and "Best Animation‚Äù at the Royal Television Society in the United Kingdom.
In 2014 for Alfred Hitchcock's silent film, The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog.
Also in 2017 for the Buster Keaton film The General, with a premiere October 17, 2017.
The General (2017) (commissioned live concert score) by Buster Keaton
If There Be Thorns (2015) (original score music) by VC Andrews, dir.
Seeds of Yesterday (2015) (original score music) by VC Andrews, dir.
The Lodger (2014) (commissioned live concert score) by Alfred Hitchcock
Little Paradise (2014) (original score music) by Natan Moss
Waking (2013) (original score music) by Ben Shelton
City of Ember (2008) (additional music composer, writer and performer: Mayor's Fanfare) by Gil Kenan
Trick 'r Treat (2007) (original score composer) by Michael Dougherty
Monster House (2006) (original score composer) by Gil Kenan
